verses.text: Mamin Jehová, a t'ayach tzin col in b'a, mocab' in kan t'a q'uixwelal uuj.
Colin, colinel t'a yol sk'ab' heb' ajk'ool yajoch t'ayin, yujto tojol ach. Ab' wal tas swala', tzin a colani.
Ochanh wenhuloc icha junok nhak'een b'aj syal in colan in b'a. Ala' to tzin colchaji yujto icha in cuartel aji, icha in nhak'een aji.
Ach in Diosal, colinel t'a heb' chuk, t'a heb' milumcham anima yet' t'a heb' ixtum anima.
Mamin Jehová Vajalil, toxonton yip ach in k'ool yictax t'a in quelemal.
Yictax ix in alji t'a ix in nun, a t'ayach swik' wip. Ha ach ix in ak' aljoc. Ol ach in b'itejnhej.
Tzijtum mach sat sk'ol yilan tas tzin ik'ani, palta ach in Diosal, anhej t'ayach tzin col in b'a.
Masanil tiempo, swal wach' lolonel t'ayach yuj sniwanil elk'ochi.
Manh in a patiquejeli, yujto icham winaquinxo. Manh in actejcani yujto manhxalaj wip.
Ha heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin snib'ej in smilanchamoc, smol yetb'eyum heb', slajtian sb'a heb' t'a in patic.
Syalan heb': Pechec, yamec. Manhxo ayococh Dios yet'oc, manhxalaj mach ol colanel ticnaik, xchi heb'.
Ach in Diosal, manh najatoc tzach el t'a in tz'ey. Cotanh t'a elanhchamel, ochanh wed'oc.
Ha heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, chamocab' heb' yuj q'uixwelal. Ha heb' tz'alan tas chuk t'a in patic yic tzin yixtan heb' yalani, malajocab' tz'ajkan yelk'och heb'.
Palta, a inxo tik ach in Diosal, ayachnhej och yipoc in k'ol t'a junjun rato. Ol ach in b'itej yet' in tzalajk'olal.
Masanil tiempo ol walel yab'ixal a tojolal yet' a colwal, wach'chom max nachaj wuuj smasanil.
Mamin Jehová Cajalil, a juntzanh tastac te satub'tac ix a k'ulej, ha' ol in b'itej. Ol walel ab'ixal to a achnhej tojol ach.
Ach in Diosal, yictax in quelemal, ix in a k'ayb'ani. Anhejtona' walanel juntzanh tastac niwac b'ob'ilcan uuj ticnaik.
Ach in Diosal, wach'chom icham inxo, sacxo xil in jolom, palta manh in actejcani yic ol yal walanel yab'ixal a poder t'a heb' toto ol aljoc.
Ach in Diosal, yelxo wal te niwan a tojolal icha snajatil satcha’anh. Niwan tastac ix a k'ulej. Malaj junok mach icha ach tik.
Wach'chom tzijtum tas ix in ik'ani yet' yaelal ix ak' t'ayin, palta ol in ak'xi pitzwoc. Ol in ik'xik'eta t'a sjulal lum lum.
Te niwan ol aj welk'och uuj, ol ak'anpax sniwanil in k'ool.
Ha inxo tik, ol ach in b'itej yujto tzak'elk'och tas tzala'. Ol wak'an yuj diosal t'ayach yet' te' arpa yet' te' chinhb'il. Ach in Diosal, ko Diosal ach a onh aj israel onh tik.
Ol ach in b'itej t'a tzalajk'olal, yujto ix in a colo'.
Ol walel a tojolal t'a masanil k 'inal. Ha heb' ix nib'an to ay tas ix in ik'ani, ix telwi heb', ix te q'uixwicanel heb'.
